lines.text: This is an honor, Mr. Beverly, you're my hero. You're rich, you're powerful, you're famous, you're ruthless. Nobody fucks with you, you fuck with everybody!
Dying? Just another step on the journey, man!
God, this is my man, and you'd better take care of him, or I'm gonna wax your ass.
Hey Cool, don't drink that wine, it struck me blind!
You ain't blind, you just in the damn closet.
If this is love, sex is gonna kill you!
Hey, Cool. Is it the reefer, or is someone else singing one of my songs?
Well, the song is the same, but... different!
